list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: occupy, attract, or involve (someone's interest or attention).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he plowed on, trying to outline his plans and engage Sutton's attention
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta cày xới, cố gắng phác thảo kế hoạch của mình và thu hút sự chú ý của Sutton

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: organizations engage in a variety of activities
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: tổ chức tham gia vào một loạt các hoạt động

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was engaged as a trainee copywriter
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông đã tham gia như một copywriter thực tập sinh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (with reference to a part of a machine or engine) move into position so as to come into operation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ly hợp sẽ không tham gia

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of fencers or swordsmen) bring (weapons) together preparatory to fighting.
(of a writer, artist, or their works) morally committed to a particular aim or cause.
